results.title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Italian version]
results.creator_credit: Peter Lake and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: At a family picnic by a river, a father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Italian.
results.title_for_label: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Italian version]
results.description: At a family picnic by a river, a father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Italian.

results.title: Ask an Australian about pedestrians [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: The numerous hazards facing a pedestrian in a busy Australian city are pointed out. The importance of observing signals, crossing on pedestrian overpasses or crosswalks, and carefully watching traffic are emphasised. Note: In Turkish.
results.description: The numerous hazards facing a pedestrian in a busy Australian city are pointed out. The importance of observing signals, crossing on pedestrian overpasses or crosswalks, and carefully watching traffic are emphasised. Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about her household [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Turkish.
results.title_for_label: Ask an Australian about her household [Turkish version]
results.description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Turkish.
